Translations.Text: ara antare ya ache ta prakasa kara habe
niscaya tadera raba sedina tadera byapare sabisesa abahita
Bhitiprada maha bipada
bhitiprada maha bipada ki
ara bhitiprada maha bipada samparke apanake kise janabe
sedina manusa habe biksipta patangera mata
ara parbatasamuha habe dhunita rangina pasamera mata
Atahpara yara pallasamuha [1] bhari habe
se to thakabe santosajanaka jibane
Ara yara pallasamuha halka habe
tara sthana habe â€˜ha'oyiyahâ€™
Ara apanake kise janabe seta ki
atyanta uttapta aguna
Tomaderake mohacchanna rakhe [1] pracuryera pratiyogita
yataksana na tomara kabare upanita ha'o
Kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
tarapara, kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
kakhano naya! Yadi tomara niscita jnane jnani hate
abasya'i tomara jahannama dekhabe
tarapara abasya'i tomara ta dekhabe caksusa pratyaye
tarapara abasya'i sedina tomaderake neyamata samparke prasna kara habe
